plugin.name: Elide
plugin.description:
Elide is a fast batteries-included runtime, with support for Kotlin, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. This plugin adds support for the following features:
  • Import Elide projects in the IDE (currently only for Kotlin/JVM)
  • Install dependencies on project sync, with support for sources and documentation
  • Run configurations for entry points declared in the Elide project manifest
  • Run main entry points from the gutter in JVM projects
  • Run common Elide tasks from the IDE (`build`, `install`, `run`)
  • Use a custom Elide distribution for running tasks

plugin.name: Pkl
plugin.description:
Language support for Pkl. Compatible with IntelliJ 2023.1 or higher and Pkl 0.25 or higher.

Features:

  • Code editing and navigation
  • Code completion
  • Code formatting
  • Syntax checking and highlighting
  • Type and constraint checking
